channel.title: Comments on: Kickstarted
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Picks of the Week, Week 2 « The One A Day Project
item.dc:creator: Picks of the Week, Week 2 « The One A Day Project
item.description: [...] Monserrat’s post about his attempts to get his “game… book… experiment thing” The Stork funded via Kickstarter provides an important life lesson for anyone doing something they care [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Monserrat’s post about his attempts to get his “game… book… experiment thing” The Stork funded via Kickstarter provides an important life lesson for anyone doing something they care […]

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I may offer them for sale there, but I'm thinking I might just stick with my distributor (Indie Press Revolution) because it is easier to just have them handle the orders.
item.content:encoded: I may offer them for sale there, but I’m thinking I might just stick with my distributor (Indie Press Revolution) because it is easier to just have them handle the orders.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Nice story! And a good lesson.
Will you be offering The Stork on the Dreampunk website when the print run is finished? I'd like to purchase a copy, if possible.
item.content:encoded:
Nice story! And a good lesson.

Will you be offering The Stork on the Dreampunk website when the print run is finished? I’d like to purchase a copy, if possible.
